Name: Bare Metal
About the game: Bare Metal is a fast-paced tug-of-war game. Each player has 4 towers that produce units: Tank, Chopper, Anti-Air and Mobile Bomb. Your base generates power to spend on units. Units get a veteran level for every three kills. You can spend more power to produce a veteran unit. Victory is achieved by killing your enemyâ€™s units and towers.
